summary: A teenage petty criminal dreams of escaping his increasingly unlawful lifestyle when he meets a sweet girl who hopes to one day travel to Alaska.
cast: Brendan Sexton III|Antoine McLean|Mtume Gant|Carlo Alban|David Roland Frank|Adrian Grenier|Lynn Cohen|L.M. Kit Carson|Edie Falco|Isidra Vega|Andy Ko|José Zúñiga|Terry Alexander|Heather Matarazzo|Shawn Elliott|Socorro Santiago|Jinn S. Kim|Damian Corrente|David Moscow|Preston B. Handy|Terry Sturiano|Anna Basoli|Richard Petrocelli|Leslie Body|Frank L. Messina|Connie Picard|James Ashley|Chrissy Martinez
title: Hurricane Streets
